title: Did Mitch McConnell have a cargo ship found carrying 90 pounds? - Cocaine?
subtitle: The Colombian Navy discovered a relatively small amount of cocaine hidden on a boat belonging to a company owned by Mitch McConnell ' s father-in-law.
author: Alex Kasprak
vclaim: About 90 pounds of cocaine were found on a cargo ship owned by the majority leader of the United States Senate and the anti-drug politician Mitch McConnell.
